name: KeyChain
description:
KeyChain

You have got the key...

Now all you have to do is get it to the lock!

  • You can drag the anchors with the mouse
  • To get to the next level, get the key to the lock
  • If you get stuck, use the restart button on the top-right
  • Make it through all seven levels to win!
Attributions
